SELECT gender, count(*) as cnt FROM member GROUP BY gender

SELECT CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 10 AND 19 THEN '10대' WHEN age BETWEEN 20 AND 39 THEN '청년층' WHEN age BETWEEN 40 AND 59 THEN '장년층' WHEN age >= 60 THEN '노년층' WHEN age < 10 OR age IS NULL THEN '기타' END as age_range , count(*) as cnt FROM member GROUP BY age_range
